channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Even after the selloff, U.S. stocks are still too pricey, says Citigroup, cutting them to neutral
item.description: Citigroup downgrades U.S. stocks to neutral, saying valuations are still too rich.

item.title: Here’s how much of his fortune Bill Gates will leave to his kids—but who gets the $130 million Washington estate?
item.description: At the heart of his property portfolio is Xanadu 2.0, an expansive compound named for the fictional estate in the movie ‘Citizen Kane.’

item.title: My late uncle’s house is in foreclosure. A woman claims to be his daughter and my cousin is a squatter. What can we do?
item.description: “She keeps threatening to remove this nephew from the home.”

item.title: ‘The whole thing feels predatory’: My grandma, 97, pays $170 a month for a $10,000 life-insurance policy. Should we stop payments?
item.description: “After what quickly became a heated discussion, the agent advised me that canceling the policy would end any chance of a payout.”

item.title: Investors are jittery about earnings — and that’s opening up big opportunities, say Goldman strategists
item.description: Looking at the demand for put over call options, fear remains at extreme levels despite the 90-day delay in most tariffs, say strategists led by John ...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...
